mapper.select: SELECT r.idx as 'reviewIdx', r.content as 'content' FROM reviews r JOIN restaurant r2 ON r.restaurant_idx = r2.idx AND r2.idx = #{restaurantIdx} WHERE DATE(r.created_at) = DATE(#{offeredAt}) AND r.is_today_review = 1 OR r.idx = ( SELECT rm.review_idx FROM review_marks rm JOIN reviews r ON rm.review_idx = r.idx WHERE DATE(r.created_at) = DATE(#{offeredAt}) GROUP BY rm.review_idx ORDER BY COUNT(rm.review_idx) DESC LIMIT 1 )
